title: SeedChecker
author: SeedChecker
created_time: March 09, 2023, 05:45:42 PMLast edit: August 12, 2023, 09:58:36 PM by SeedChecker

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: SeedChecker on March 09, 2023, 05:45:42 PMSeedChecker is a browser-based software for checking and 24/7 monitoring of Seed-phrase balances.~Warning - This is most likely a scam!It is important for everyone to be extra cautious with this type of software, as it is clearly designed to trick users into handing over their seed phrases and private keys. Whether it is open-source or not, it is simply not wise to trust any software or website that requires access to your seed phrase. It makes me wonder why the developer opted for a seed phrase instead of a master pub key. Why didn't they choose the more secure option that would not require users to give up their sensitive private information?

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: If it were to be a wallet checker, it would be understandable that the software was designed with  a clean and clear function to keep track of assets and notify holders of any activities involving the owners wallet but you designed a software for some one to out in his or her seed phrase just to monitor wallet activities, who does that at this current time. Are you a hacker? Or do you want to do away with people's funds and assets? OP this inovation of yours does not augur well as nobody would look into your software because it is against the blockchain ethics and if one inputs their seed phrase, automatically it means that their wallets is actually at risk and therefore would not dare using that software. Come to talk of it, there are many trackers software designed to keep track and notify owners of their wallet activities without requesting for seed phrase. I WOULD ADVISE ANYONE USING THIS SOFTWARE IS AT HIS OR HER OWN RISKSCAM!!

comments.author: dragonvslinux
comments.body: Quote from: Stalker22 on March 09, 2023, 07:17:41 PMQuote from: SeedChecker on March 09, 2023, 05:45:42 PMSeedChecker is a browser-based software for checking and 24/7 monitoring of Seed-phrase balances.~Warning - This is most likely a scam!This isn't most likely a scam - THIS IS A SCAM. Never give your seed phrase over to anyone.See OP's trust page for feedback.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: I could not have phrased it better.After the manner in which you have articulated the main point about it being wise to not trust any website that required or asked for seed phrases it would be a huge mistake if anybody reading your post went on to enter private details in this or any other so-called seed checker website. Anybody entering their seed phrases in any website are most likely going to see their disappear, it is not worth the risk and there is no real reason to enter seed phrases anywhere.Quote from: Stalker22 on March 09, 2023, 07:17:41 PMQuote from: SeedChecker on March 09, 2023, 05:45:42 PMSeedChecker is a browser-based software for checking and 24/7 monitoring of Seed-phrase balances.~Warning - This is most likely a scam!It is important for everyone to be extra cautious with this type of software, as it is clearly designed to trick users into handing over their seed phrases and private keys. Whether it is open-source or not, it is simply not wise to trust any software or website that requires access to your seed phrase. It makes me wonder why the developer opted for a seed phrase instead of a master pub key. Why didn't they choose the more secure option that would not require users to give up their sensitive private information?

comments.author: speedy963
comments.body: Newbies!! Beware and Be aware that you are sole responsible for your own security! Nobody/No one on their right mind would ask for your seed phrase!This has been reported already for your reference check it here.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: It's been a long time since I last saw such a cheap attempt to steal people's coins. So the point is to enter the seed to "check" that it's only "yours". Unbelievable. Never under any circumstances share your seed or private keys with other parties. As Aussie Man once said, all we can hope for is that people looking to steal from others die in horrible house fires.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: SeedChecker on March 09, 2023, 05:49:52 PMOur software will be useful for you only if you have a large base of Seed phrases (from 500 pieces and more). Our software does not make sense to work with 1-2 Seed phrases.Why don't you work with master public keys instead of seed words?If you want to sell your product, you're going to have to make sure you can't scam people. Asking for seed words is a big no-go. An easy workaround would be to instruct the user to run your software offline. Nobody should ever enter their seed words in an online computer anyway. For the $300 you're asking, you could easily let the user download a couple hundred GB containing all possible addresses on those chains, and the user could check his 500 seed phrases offline, and shred the computer afterwards.But that's only needed if you want to be legit. If you want to steal seed phrases, you're right on track.

comments.author: T3PR00T
comments.body: Quote from: SeedChecker on March 09, 2023, 05:45:42 PM$300 one-time + $99 / monthInstant Purchase: telegram @buyseedchecker_botAny questions? telegram @chain_flintI have wallet with 50 BTC, the wallet have over 1000 address. How can you help if I give you my seed

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: SeedChecker on March 09, 2023, 05:45:42 PM100% OpenSource. SeedChecker is a fully open source product. You can analyze the entire code as well as make any changes.Price:$300 one-time + $99 / monthHow is the app open source and you ask users to pay you? It's a double scam because they will lose the $300 paid to the scam program + they may lose any money if they add their seed to your app.I hope you don't get any money from people who are too hot to use such scam.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: T3PR00T on March 11, 2023, 02:40:57 PMI have wallet with 50 BTC, the wallet have over 1000 address. How can you help if I give you my seed   Let me clear that up for you. In fact, it's very easy to understand so pay attention.1. You download this beautiful piece of software.2. You enter your seed phrase.3. The OP empties your wallet and takes your coins. 4. You no longer have to worry about the BTC price, how long to hold, when to see, how to pay your taxes. 5. You are stress and worry-free for the rest of your life. A win-win situation.

comments.author: speedy963
comments.body: I think it's best that this thread should be locked, and I think majority already wants this thread to be closed since it's already obvious.Let this be a reminder for newbies who wants to explore and learn, or could serve as a warning that asking one's seed phrase is a big No-No.You are the ones responsible for your own assets and security.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: You as the OP and the operator of the business really should address the questions surrounding your motives and addressing the issues behind the reasons why a flag was created against you. Are you able to put forward any argument to counter the views that senior members of the forum have built about you?I have supported the flag but have thus far refrained from leaving any tags as I want to hear your side first. If you do not manage to respond to the concerns made by multiple members here within the next few days I would feel obligated to leave appropriate trust on your profile.Quote from: SeedChecker on March 09, 2023, 05:45:42 PM- By using the SeedChecker software, you confirm that all seed phrases used on your part belong only to you.- By purchasing the software, you confirm that you going to use the author's products exclusively for lawful purposes.- The author is not responsible for your legal / illegal actions, as a result of which harm was caused to any person.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: SCAM ALERT FOR NEWBIES, DO NOT GIVE YOUR SEED(PRIVATE KEYS) TO THIRD PARTIES.Reserving for translation bounty, fake review, shilling etc. Good project! Not. LolI have a few K seeds that needs checking, my penthouse is at the Ivory tower, if you could come and check them please.
